original_text: And thou shalt grope at noonday, as the blind gropeth in darkness, and thou shalt not prosper in thy ways: and thou shalt be only oppressed and spoiled evermore, and no man shall save thee.
korean_text: 맹인이 어두운 데에서 더듬는 것과 같이 네가 백주에도 더듬고 네 길이 형통하지 못하여 항상 압제와 노략을 당할 뿐이리니 너를 구원할 자가 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt grope at noonday
as the blind gropeth in darkness
and thou shalt not prosper in thy ways
and thou shalt be only oppressed and spoiled evermore
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 오직 억압과 탈취만을 당하게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and no man shall save thee
